author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENZO LOSING ORGANIZATION OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...LORENZO LOSING ORGANIZATION OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Wed Oct 15 the center of Lorenzo was located near 21.5, -44.1 with movement NNE at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENZO LOSING ORGANIZATION OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Wed Oct 15 the center of Lorenzo was located near 21.5, -44.1 with movement NNE at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
